Articles.Content:
Well, I looked through the forum and had no idea where else to post something like this, so I'll just post it here.

I am not sure how many of you know Adam Young.

Tl,dr.; He is a musician and mostly known for creating Owl City.

 

And He released a new score, several(9) days ago.

About Apollo 11.

Here it is.

For maximum effect mute this and star playing the one called "Launch"(It's the first one).

Preferably at the same time.

 

Your Welcome

Nice, thanks for sharing.  Only listened to the first track so far, but it's pretty nice.  
Pity that it's not under a CC licence, would be good for KSP movies otherwise.
As this is not about KSP itself, the thread has been moved to the Lounge.
